headline: Peter Thiel Once Said Brilliant Thinking Is 'Rare' But Even Rarer And In 'Shorter Supply' Is This Personality Trait
summary: Venture capitalist and Palantir (NASDAQ:PLTR) chairman Peter Thiel has long argued that the real bottleneck in innovation isn't brainpower but bravery, the willingness to back an idea most people think is wrong. Thiel Says Genius Means Little Without Courage Speaking in 2015 about his book ‘Zero to One: Notes on Startups, or How to Build the Future’ at an event hosted by the Independent Institute, Thiel said many people are smart enough to spot opportunities, but far fewer are willing to pursue

In this dynamic environment, high growth tech stocks are often characterized by their innovative capabilities and potential to leverage emerging trends like AI and cloud computing, making them intriguing options for investors...

headline: US software stocks tumble sparks concerns that AI trade is reshaping markets
summary: The software and services industry's recent plunge has ignited fears that the artificial intelligence boom may be reshaping markets in unexpected ways, raising questions about whether a rotation out of technology stocks signals trouble ahead for ​the AI trade.  Financial markets, juiced for months with investor enthusiasm about the artificial intelligence trade, got a rude awakening last week as software stocks around ‌the globe sank on worries that fast-advancing AI tools could upend the industry.  While a rebound in the broader market helped soothe nerves on Friday, the outlook for U.S. software stocks, at the epicenter of the ‌selloff, remained murky.

content.title: US software stocks tumble sparks concerns that AI trade is reshaping markets

headline: Palantir Cognizant AI Push Tests High Valuation And Weak Momentum
summary: Palantir Technologies and Cognizant have expanded their partnership to speed up AI driven modernization in healthcare and other enterprises. This development highlights Palantir's push beyond government contracts into broader commercial and compliance focused markets. headline: Why Palantir Technologies (PLTR) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of data analytics company Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ:PLTR) jumped 6% in the afternoon session after analysts suggested that the recent "SaaSpocalypse" sell-off had pushed valuations into deeply oversold territory, sparking a wave of opportunistic buying.
